Reference

All functions

genautocorr()

genautocorr calculates genetic autocorrelation for later linkage disequilibrium filtering

genautocorr_filter()

polyIBD filter for linkage disequilibrium

getTransProbs()

Get transition probabilities

ggplot_IBD()

Plot marginal IBD matrix

ggplot_IBDraster()

Plot polyIBD outputs collectively

ggplot_SNPs_IBD()

Plot marginal IBD matrix with true IBD option and VCF that would have been generated for the two samples for comparison

ggplot_f()

Trace ggplot of f individual

ggplot_f_postprob()

Trace ggplot of f posterior prob

ggplot_k()

Trace plot of k

ggplot_m1()

Trace ggplot of m1

ggplot_m2()

Trace ggplot of m2

plot.polyIBD()

Default multi-panel plot for polyIBD class

plot_IBD()

Plot marginal IBD matrix

plot_f()

Trace plot of f posterior prob

Trace plot of k

plot_m1()

Trace plot of m1

plot_m2()

Trace plot of m2

polyIBD

polyIBD

runMCMC()

Run polyIBD MCMC using Rcpp functions

simData()

Simulate data from polyIBD model

simIBD()

Simulate IBD sections between two samples
